discussion.content:
D. Replace the static data update with a continuous feed.

This option directly addresses the issue of data being often out of date by ensuring that the dashboard receives updated data continuously or at frequent intervals. By implementing a continuous feed mechanism, users will have access to the most recent data without manual intervention, improving the timeliness and accuracy of the information presented on the dashboard.

questions.question_text: An analyst needs to modify an existing dashboard because data is often out of date. Which of the following is the BEST way for the analyst to help resolve the issue?

choices.D: Replace the static data update with a continuous feed.
choices.B: Schedule delivery so users know when to look for updated data.
choices.C: Add a data refresh date to the dashboard so users know when the data was last updated.
choices.A: Add filters to the dashboard so users can find the data they are looking for.

questions.question_text: A data analyst has just finished cleansing a database table and is now ready to update the master. However, the analyst must first check to ensure all the work is accurate. Which of the following data quality checkpoints is the analyst using?

discussion.content:
D. Data transformation

The data analyst is using a data quality checkpoint related to data transformation. Data transformation involves cleaning, aggregating, or otherwise modifying the data to prepare it for analysis or integration into the master database table. Checking the accuracy of the data transformation ensures that the cleaned data accurately reflects the intended changes and meets the quality standards before updating the master database.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the correct data type for text?

discussion.content: B. The correct data type for text is a string. A string is a data type that represents a sequence of characters, such as letters, numbers, and symbols. Strings are often used to store and manipulate text data, such as names, addresses, and descriptions. The other options (Boolean, integer, and float) are not appropriate data types for text. A Boolean data type represents a true or false value, and an integer data type represents a whole number. A float data type represents a decimal number.

questions.question_text: Which of the following data formats are examples of unstructured data? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: DF. PNG (image) and MP4 (audio) are unstructured data.

D. Company branding

While all the options are relevant to some extent, company branding is the most important in this scenario. Including company branding ensures that the presentation maintains a professional and consistent appearance, aligning with the company's identity and reinforcing its brand image. This can help establish credibility and make the presentation more engaging for the board members.

questions.question_text: A data analyst is preparing a presentation for the companyâ€™s board of directors. The presentation will not contain any confidential information and will only be provided to the board members. Which of the following is the MOST important information to include in the presentation?
